name: Out Of Time (itch) (DavidDevsDumbStuff)
description:
This game is a faced paced platformer where you have to complete the levels under the time limit. With the help of your robot friends, of course.

Note: If  WebGL does not work, just download the windows version. there is a glitch where it almost loads and then doesn't.

Also, I know that there are many things I need to fix for this game. For example:

-Options not working

-More levels

-Glitchy dialouge box

-other glitches

If you find any other glitches, please let me know!
